letters.description: Establishing a safe, intentional container and setting sacred boundaries for somatic exploration.
Cultivating present-moment mindfulness through conscious breath and internal sensory tracking.
Developing energetic resonance and authentic intimacy between the physical and spiritual self.
Identifying and discharging emotional blockages, trauma, and restrictive social conditioning.
Amplifying vital life force (Prana) to heighten consciousness and ecstatic potential.
Integrating the experience into a daily practice of reverence and embodied living.
